[center][font size=5]Mythtv .28 Docker Changelog[/font][/center] [font size=4]2016.07.24[/font] - Built on phusion 0.9.19(based off ubuntu 16.04) - Mythtv from mythbuntu .28 ppa - updated to jre 8 (Not that this matters) - Uses the code from Sparklyballs's mythtv container. This is 95% based off his work. I fixed a couple of path changes in the Dockerfile for changes to php5 to php7 and changed packages that needed to be changed due to the change to phusion base. - Mythweb appears to work with no issues. - I was able to schedule some recordings after working through the mythtv-setup. SEE BELOW for the biggest hurdle that I can't seem to get past for public consumption.
[center][font size=5]Mythtv .28 Docker OPEN ISSUES[/font][/center] - QT5 issues with keyboard in mythtv-setup. Mouse works fine, most keys work letters and numbers. but enter key and arrow keys do not work. There are numerous bugs in QT5 that seem to be related and I have not narrowed this down. If you use the mythtv-setup in RDP, you will have to use the down arrow key as the Enter key. So, I use my mouse to highlight the option I want to use than hit the down arrow key for enter, use mouse where you can. Pain in the rear but is what it is for now.
